text:
Great news for New Yorkers with #lupus or #RA on #hydroxychloroquine or #chloroquine. Kudos to @NYGovCuomo and @HealthNYGov Commissioner Zucker for clarifying we may receive up to a 90-day supply. Share
https://t.co/JnifAZaVyT with your doctors and pharmacists. @GHLForg @lupusorg https://t.co/Yumw8zWgLA
